product_name: YayLabs! Ice Cream Ball & Inflatable Cover Set - Quart - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The Yaylabs! Ice Cream Ball & Inflatable Cover Set - Quart size makes ice cream the active, fun way. Add cream, sugar and ice to 30 minutes of playful movement, and you'll make 1 quart of ice cream! Simply load ice and rock salt in 1 end, and ice cream ingredients in the other. Put on the inflatable cover for insulation and cushioning as you shake, roll or toss around the ball. After 30 minutes of constant movement, voila, you've played your way to a quart of delicious ice cream! Fun design delights kids and adults alike-great for backyard parties, a day at the beach and family camping. Made sturdy for many batches of ice cream and fun; recipe booklet included. The Yaylabs! Ice Cream Ball features a copolyester plastic exterior, anodized aluminum can and food-grade rubber O-ring-all 100% BPA free. The Yaylabs! Inflatable Cover is phthalate free and has 2 air valves for easy inflation; rip-and-stick tabs on the sides allow secure closure; reusable fun stickers included. Overstock.
short_description: The Yaylabs! Ice Cream Ball & Inflatable Cover Set - Quart size makes ice cream the active, fun way. Add cream, sugar and ice to 30 minutes of playful movement, and you'll make 1 quart of ice cream!
